alert.note: Alert for Bell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 11:43AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Bell County through 1215 PM CDT... At 1143 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Stillhouse Hollow Lake to near Jarrell to near Sun City. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Killeen, Harker Heights, Belton, Nolanville, Bartlett, Salado, Little River-Academy, Rogers, Holland, Stillhouse Hollow Lake, Sparks, Union Grove, Leedale, Edgeworth, and Prairie Dell. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 278 and 291. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
